embed.title: Cyclops Tips
embed.description: Tips on Cyclops Honor Hunting formation.

fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Use 2 Pilgrims (3 if they are level-8).
• Use 3 Brawlers (4 if they are level-8).
• Use as many Voodoo Dolls as you can.
• Use as many level-9 long-range units (preferably Peltasts and Taurus Witchers) as you can.
• Use level-9 Ghost Assassins as filler troops. Put them at the back row(s).
• Use level-9 Undead Soldier as filler troops.
• Do not use the Evade button.

fields.name: Stages
fields.value:
• Stage 1: day 1-3
• Stage 2: day 4-6
• Stage 3: day 7
